The contemporary finishing in this property will appeal to young couples and processionals. This makes for a very sound investment option.
For city lovers who enjoys being in the heart of action then this property wont disappointment. 
Please note that the photos on this advertisement are not of the actual unit for sale.
Visit also our Team at our Retail Shop located in Marina Gate 1, Dubai Marina.']

Contact Gulf Sothebys International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionBerkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties proudly presents this Commercial / Residential  contemporary villa located on Al Wasl Road Umm Suqeim 3.
The villa features high end specifications which include two large master suites with their own sitting rooms on an all ensuite 8 bedrooms with solid American walnut wood built in cabinets. Designed to its maximum quality, this villa is very elegant and built on a state of the art materials. The first grade Italian marble flooring covers the open plan living room and parquet flooring on some of the rooms, all wooden doors are American made, large modern kitchen fitted with MIELE appliances and German cabinets, lightings are from Europe and all bathroom fittings are manufactured by from Villeroy and Boch.
The high ceiling panel with wood works is the focal point in main living/dining room. And because it is made of glass, it is energy and cost saving. It invites natural sunlight giving the whole area an airy and cozy ambiance. It has 9 Bathrooms.
There are two family lounge on the upper floor perfect for family get-together or an extended reception area. Enjoy the outdoor with the beautifully planned verandas with full privacy. The temperature controllled swimming pool is under maintenance contract with SPLASH POOLS, all equipments are European originated and is cleaned thrice weekly.
The villa is cladded with external natural stone with ample provision for staff rooms and dedicated laundry room for four washing machines with cabinet sand-ironing tables. It is fully fenced for privacy and security of the residents/tenants. Drive in porch in front of the villa and basement parking spaces are available.
Call Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties on +971504127168 to find out more about this stunning villa.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionTreo Homes is proud to present to the market this Brand New Type 1 , 3Bed+Maid, Brand New villa in the very sought after Samara Arabian Ranches 2.Type13Bedrooms+MaidWhite WoodSingle Row3026BUA4300 PlotClose to PoolWalking\xa0through the front door, one is pleasantly\xa0greeted with a spacious open plan staircase downstairs, a sizable open living\xa0and dining area, and well finished kitchen with serving counter leading out onto a private laundry room and maids area. A private garden makes this unit perfect for families entertaining guests. The first floor offer 2 spacious rooms sharing a Jack & Jill style bathroom, and a greatly master bedroom, with ample walk in\xa0closet and well finished bathroom.To view this property or any other units in this community or the surrounding areas please contact our Area Manager Andrie Jackel to walk you through the whole process and view\xa0multiple units in Samara and the new community in Ranches 2,Azalea. Sharing a similar floorpan to that of Samara.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionWe are proud to offer this unique investment opportunity for a residential building in District One, MBRC.- Whole residential or hospitality-use buildings- 31 units | 26-1BR, 5-2BRs- High ROI investment- G+4, G+6, G+7, G+8, G+12, G+16 Options- Largest Crystal Blue Lagoon with beaches in the world- Only 10% Down Payment- 50 / 50 Payment Plan, with 50% due on delivery of entire building- Cycling, walking / Jogging trails- Dubai Mall size- Come & view the master plan, completed districts & lagoon phase 1Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum City - District One is only minutes away from many of Dubai\x92s world-class attractions, landmarks and transport links. It is next door to distinguished leisure facilities such as the Meydan Racecourse and Grandstand, The Track, Meydan Golf, a 9-hole floodlit golf course, and the 5-star luxury Meydan Hotel.E & T Real Estate has been trading since 2004 and has become one of the most successful real estate agencies in the UAE']
